summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 HAWK TRAILER, MODEL 132 (NA) WITH A DORMAN WHEEL HUB DUST CAP (PART NUMBER: 13913). WHILE DRIVING 65 MPH, THE CONTACT LOOKED THROUGH THE PASSENGER SIDE REARVIEW MIRROR AND NOTICED THAT THE BOTTOM OF THE TRAILER WAS COMING APART. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE WHEEL HUB DUST CAP ON THE FRONT PASSENGER WHEEL BECAME DETACHED AND WAS DAMAGED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE DEALER AND MANUFACTURER WERE NOT NOTIFIED. THERE WAS NO MILEAGE.
